 john@yahoo.net

Dear Hiring Manager,

I wish to apply for the position of Extended Day Program Teacher in The University Child Development School.I hold a Bachelor of Arts in Preschool Education with five years of educational experience.

In my last role as a early childhood educator in Our Beginning, I was involved in creating a Reggio-inspired learning environment for children, collaborating with my co-teacher to implement safe and creative daily activities for children aged 2-5. Considering the importance of the environment in Reggio Emilia approach, I was able to find age-appropriate learning materials for children, I always emphasize collaboration and leadership to help children resolve the problem when they are in need.I also highly focus on the safety and hygiene in the classroom, making sure children feel supported. 

I believe that my passion, patience and energy combine to make a viable candidate for your position. I look forward to providing any application materials that may be required as well as the opportunity to meet with you for an interview.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Feiyan Guo

Feiyan Guo
n8532852883 
Seattle, WA, 98103
john@yahoo.net

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to apply for the position of Extended Day Program Teacher at The University Child Development School. With a Bachelor of Arts in Preschool Education and five years of educational experience, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team.

In my previous role as an early childhood educator at Our Beginning, I had the opportunity to create a Reggio-inspired learning environment for children. Working collaboratively with my co-teacher, we implemented safe and creative daily activities for children aged 2-5. Guided by the principles of the Reggio Emilia approach, I ensured the availability of age-appropriate learning materials and promoted collaboration and leadership skills among the children. Additionally, maintaining a safe and hygienic classroom environment was a top priority to ensure the well-being and support of each child.

I am passionate about early childhood education and believe that my patience, energy, and dedication make me a strong candidate for this position. I am eager to provide any additional application materials that may be required and would welcome the opportunity to meet with you for an interview.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of joining The University Child Development School and contributing to the growth and development of its students.

Sincerely,
Feiyan Guo

can you help me to polish this mail: As you may know, our project “kickstarting the world’s largest completion contract ADNOC DCE” is awarded with Special Recognition for Integration and Collaboration. 
Congratulations to Ying Yue and whole CPU team!!

Besides this, I would like to thank all of our CS
1.	closely engage with ANDNOC project team about the demand/delivery
2.	smartly quote all parts without issues
3.	diligently follow up about SO status no mater it’s expedite or defer or expedite after defer
4.	proactively work with planning team about delivery plan

I would like to say this is a great teamwork we do, and I see these points in our daily job as well.  This gives me an opportunity to shout loudly to all. 
Proud of you!

Subject: Congratulations and Thank You to the CPU Team!

Dear [Recipient],

I hope this email finds you well. I would like to take a moment to share some exciting news with you. Our project, "Kickstarting the World's Largest Completion Contract ADNOC DCE," has been awarded Special Recognition for Integration and Collaboration. This is a tremendous achievement and I want to extend my heartfelt congratulations to Ying Yue and the entire CPU team. Well done!

Additionally, I would like to express my sincere gratitude to all of our Customer Success members. Your hard work and dedication have been instrumental in the success of this project. I want to highlight a few key contributions that deserve recognition:

1. Close engagement with the ADNOC project team: Your seamless collaboration and effective communication have greatly facilitated the demand and delivery process.

2. Exceptional quoting skills: Your ability to smartly and accurately quote all parts without encountering any issues has been commendable.

3. Diligent follow-up on SO status: Whether it's an expedite, deferment, or expedite after deferment, your unwavering commitment to following up on the status of sales orders has been invaluable.

4. Proactive collaboration with the planning team: Your proactive approach in working closely with the planning team to develop a well-structured delivery plan has greatly contributed to the overall success of our projects.

I would like to highlight that this outstanding teamwork is not only evident in the recent achievement but also in our daily responsibilities. It gives me immense pride to acknowledge the exceptional effort and dedication I witness from each and every one of you. Let this moment serve as an opportunity to collectively celebrate the achievements we have accomplished together.

Once again, congratulations on this well-deserved recognition. I am truly proud of the incredible work you all do.

With heartfelt appreciation,

[Your Name]

Dear Leon,

Thank you very much for the packing list and filling out the shipping marks.
Regarding the shipping marks, I misunderstood my forwarder. I still have to fill out the green spaces and send them to you. Later the Marks have to be glued to the boxes by you.
I’ll send this to you over the days.

My forwarder has already set up the shipment.
He gave me the contact details where you can get in touch as soon as production is finished:

Booking number: 17127

Laura
Mit freundlichen Grüßen / With best regards

TK ASIA LOGISTICS (CHINA) CO., LTD.
托马斯库拉亚洲物流（深圳）有限公司
Room 603, Building B, Lijing Business Plaza, Busha Road 57,
Zhangshubu Community, Nanwan Street, Longgang District, Shenzhen, China
TEL: +86-755-28467217-207
FAX: +86-755-28467217-208
MOB/WeChat: +86-755-28467217-207
QQ: 3190847858
Email: contact@tkasia.org
WEB:www.asia-logistics.cn

Quality control was assigned today, and as soon as I get the data here, I’ll let you know.

Best Regards
Marvin 对上面的英文内容进行英文回复。回复主要内容如下：我们不是说好的的从青岛用船运送货物吗？而且上次我们第一次合作的时候，不是这家货运代理，我们上次从青岛出运货物使用的货运代理不是这一家，这一家的货代在费用上报价要比原来那家货代贵得多，我们可以还使用上次的货运代理吗？

Dear Marvin,

I hope this email finds you well. Thank you for providing the packing list and filling out the shipping marks. However, I have a concern regarding the shipping arrangements.

We had previously agreed to ship the goods from Qingdao by sea, but it seems that the forwarder you mentioned is based in Shenzhen. Additionally, during our first cooperation, we used a different forwarder for our shipment from Qingdao, and their pricing was much lower compared to the current forwarder. Is it possible for us to continue using our previous forwarder for this shipment?

I would appreciate if you could clarify this matter and provide any necessary information. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Leon

context.content:
The following is the email I received from the graduate school. Write an academic email as a reply to this email implying that I contacted professor Lambert, the director of graduate program and she accepted to defer my application to Fall 2025. Hello Mohammad,

 

We are happy that you have decided to attend North Carolina State University and that your circumstances have not deterred you from attending.  You can defer your admission to an admit term that is within one calendar year from your original admit term, and your application submission date must not be older than one year from the date of deferral.

 

To request a deferral, you will need to contact the Director of Graduate Programs for the department office that has recommended you for admission to request (https://grad.ncsu.edu/about/people/dgp/) to ensure there is availability in your program to do so.  Once they have approved, they will confirm with the department liaison in our office and you will receive more information regarding enrollment closer to the start of your deferral term.

 

Please note that all correspondences in regards to enrollment will be sent to your email.  Any CFR documents and official transcripts will still be required for matriculation.

 

If you have any further questions about the required documents for your deferral, you can contact us at: registry@ncsu.edu.


Sincerely,

The Graduate School

Subject: Request for Admission Deferral to Fall 2025 - Mohammad Ali

Dear Graduate School Admissions Team,

Thank you for your email and for the clear guidance on the deferral process.

I am writing to inform you that I have been in touch with Professor Lambert, the Director of Graduate Programs, and have discussed my situation with her. She has graciously agreed to support the deferral of my admission to the Fall 2025 term, ensuring there is a place for me in the program at that time.

Professor Lambert mentioned that she would be coordinating with the department liaison to confirm my deferral officially. I trust this arrangement aligns with the requirements of North Carolina State University’s Graduate School and that my application will maintain its validity within the necessary timeframe.

Please let me know if there are any additional steps I need to take or forms I should complete to finalize my deferral request. I am also aware of the need to provide updated CFR documents and official transcripts prior to matriculation, and I will ensure all documentation is submitted in a timely manner.

I sincerely appreciate your understanding and assistance throughout this process. I am very much looking forward to joining North Carolina State University and starting my graduate studies in Fall 2025.

Thank you once again, and please do not hesitate to reach out if further clarification is needed or if there are more details I should attend to at this stage.

Warm regards,

Mohammad Ali
[Your Contact Information]

context.content:
"Dear Lena,

Thank you for your kind email and providing the information on behalf of the Libas team. While I am familiar with le Bal, I appreciate you attaching the History of the event and the general information for reference.

It's exciting to hear that Hannah will be wearing G Hobeika Haute Couture for le Bal, which is scheduled for Saturday, November 25, 2023. I will make a note of the important dates you mentioned: photos and videos starting on Thursday, November 23, and Friday, November 24 dedicated to photo shoots, with the waltz rehearsal at the end of the day.

I will definitely check le Bal's website and Instagram, lebal.paris, for photos and videos. If there is any additional information or specific details you feel would be useful to know, please do not hesitate to share them.

To arrange an interview with Hannah, I will connect with her mother Blair, who is cc'd on this email, for further coordination. If you believe it would be beneficial, we can also schedule a Zoom meeting in early September to discuss the upcoming event in more detail.

Thank you once again for reaching out and offering any additional information that may be helpful. I look forward to staying in touch and ensuring comprehensive coverage of le Bal." Please edit this 

With best regards,

Kieran Flint"

Subject: Inquiries about le Bal Coverage for Hannah

Dear Lena,

Thank you for reaching out and providing the information on behalf of the Libas team. I truly appreciate your email and for attaching the History of the event, as well as the general information for reference.

I am delighted to hear that Hannah will be wearing G Hobeika Haute Couture for le Bal, which is scheduled for Saturday, November 25, 2023. The important dates you mentioned, including photos and videos starting on Thursday, November 23, and Friday, November 24 dedicated to photo shoots, along with the waltz rehearsal at the end of the day, have been duly noted.

Rest assured, I will be keeping an eye on le Bal's website and Instagram, lebal.paris, to ensure that I don't miss out on any updates, photos, or videos. In the meantime, if there are any additional information or specific details that you believe would be helpful to know, please feel free to share them.

To arrange an interview with Hannah, I will connect with her mother, Blair, who is cc'd on this email, in order to discuss the further coordination. If you think it would be beneficial, we can also schedule a Zoom meeting in early September to discuss the upcoming event in more detail.

Once again, I want to express my gratitude for your outreach and willingness to provide any additional information that may prove helpful. I look forward to maintaining open communication and ensuring comprehensive coverage of le Bal.

With best regards,

Kieran Flint

I am applying to a business school with the following essay, please improve it: Teresa, a friend of mine, was upset when she told me she couldn’t get a summer job despite weeks of searching. In an attempt to help at first and a business model discovery later, I started an online job platform to connect high schoolers and businesses. We successfully helped over thirty students find part-time jobs, from building websites to creating marketing materials. It dawned on me that helping others can lead to innovative business ventures and personal fulilment. I wanted to do more.  
As I stepped into Mendoza room xx and became the only freshman on the SIBC PJT Travel Team, my ambitions found fertile ground. Sifting through piles of financial and operation accounting data, I saw our client Tutor Perini Corporation’s distress as well as hope. Analyzing records of capital structure, I discovered a restructuring plan that can be the key to getting it on the right track. I am proud that I am making a positive impact in the business world.
I aspire to make a more significant impact through business innovations. Mendoza’s immersive and comprehensive Core Curriculum are my ideal starting point.  The Accounting Measurement and Disclosure, and Business Law courses will help me build a solid foundation to “Grow the Good in Business.” I want to grow Eletic into LinkedIn for underserved communities such as the disabled, new immigrants, and homemakers. A new job could mean a new life to the people who I deeply care. Growing with the like-minded Mendoza students, I will flourish and ready to roll.

Witnessing my friend Teresa's despondence over her unsuccessful summer job search sparked a transformative idea. I transformed my desire to assist into a viable endeavor, launching an online job platform that forges connections between high school students and local businesses. The initiative proved fruitful, as we fast-tracked over thirty students into part-time positions, from web development to marketing design. This experience illuminated the profound intersection between altruistic service and groundbreaking business concepts — and it ignited in me a passion for further impact.

My journey led me to the dynamic environment of Mendoza College, where as a precocious freshman on the SIBC PJT Travel Team, I immersed myself in the world of financial analytics with Tutor Perini Corporation. Amidst the data, a narrative of challenge and resilience emerged, culminating in a strategic restructuring plan I helped devise — a testament to the proactive difference one can make in the corporate realm.

My vision to enact broader, more impactful change is perfectly aligned with Mendoza's rigorous Core Curriculum. Courses like Accounting Measurement and Disclosure, and Business Law, will equip me with the essential knowledge to nurture "the Good in Business." There is an ambition, fueled by compassion, to expand Eletic into a beacon of opportunity for marginalized communities. Empowerment through employment for the disabled, new immigrants, and homemakers, resonates as my mission's heartbeat.

Surrounded by Mendoza's community of thought leaders and change-makers, I am poised not only to develop professionally but also to contribute to a shared vision of a more inclusive and prosperous society. At Mendoza, I am ready to blossom and set forth in service of meaningful, collective progress.

context.content: WRITE A BIO FOR ME WITH NAME SEEMA TANEJA POST GRADUATED FROM FIELD BCOM.I AM A PROFESSIONAL ARTIST IN PIDILITE COMPANY FROM LAST 8 YEARS .ALSO WORKED WITH MGS HOSPITAL ALSO WORKING WITH AKHIL BHARTIYA NATRA SANG ALSO WORKING WITH SWAYAM TRUST NGO IN 1000-1200 WORDS

Seema Taneja is a dedicated and accomplished professional, possessing a post-graduate degree in Commerce (B.Com). With over eight years of experience as a professional artist in Pidilite Company, Seema has proven her expertise and creativity in the field.

Throughout her tenure at Pidilite Company, Seema has consistently delivered exceptional artwork that has exceeded client expectations. Her unique artistic vision and attention to detail have made her a valued member of the team. Seema's ability to efficiently manage multiple projects simultaneously while maintaining the highest standards of quality has earned her recognition and admiration from colleagues and clients alike.

In addition to her role at Pidilite, Seema has also had the opportunity to collaborate with MGS Hospital, a prestigious healthcare institution. Here, she utilized her artistic skills to create visually appealing and informative materials for patient education and organizational branding. Her artistry played a crucial role in enhancing the hospital's image and building trust among patients and their families.

Moreover, Seema actively contributes to the Akhil Bharatiya Natya Sangh, a renowned national theater organization. She has been involved in various theatrical productions, designing captivating set designs and costumes that have left audiences in awe. Her ability to combine her artistic talent with her deep understanding of storytelling has made her an invaluable asset to the organization.

Furthermore, Seema dedicates her time and talent to the Swayam Trust NGO. This non-governmental organization is committed to creating opportunities and empowering underprivileged sections of society. Here, Seema works alongside fellow artists to conduct art workshops for children, helping them explore their creative potential and providing them with a platform to showcase their talent. Her involvement with the Swayam Trust NGO reflects her commitment to giving back to the community and making a positive impact on the lives of others.

Seema's passion for art extends beyond her professional and voluntary engagements. She is constantly seeking new ways to refine her skills and stay updated with the latest trends in the art world. Attending workshops and participating in art exhibitions are just a few ways she stays inspired and motivated.

Beyond her artistic endeavors, Seema is known for her professionalism, reliability, and exceptional work ethic. She understands the importance of deadlines and consistently delivers projects on time without compromising on quality. Seema's ability to effectively communicate with clients, understand their visions, and bring them to life through her artwork has been key to her success.

In her personal life, Seema enjoys spending time with her family and friends. She believes in maintaining a healthy work-life balance and finds inspiration in travel, nature, and different cultures. These experiences contribute to her artistry, allowing her to infuse her work with unique perspectives and a diverse range of influences.

Seema's achievements, dedication, and passion for her craft make her an extraordinary talent in the field of art. As she continues to expand her horizons and explore new avenues, she will undoubtedly leave an indelible mark on the world of art and inspire those around her to pursue their creative passions.

Please rewrite my email and correct it grammatically.




Dear Professor Gao 

I hope this email finds you in good health and high spirits as we embark on a new year, and I wanted to express my warmest wishes for a happy, healthy, and prosperous new year to you and your loved ones.

I am writing to inform you that, despite my best efforts, I have not yet obtained my visa to the United States yet. Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, the visa process is taking longer than anticipated.
, but I would like to pursue the option of waiting until the last moment to secure my visa before requesting for deferment for fall 2024.

Attending your classes is of utmost importance to me, since I have tried my best during these past few months to improve my knowledge in this field by participating in Architectural competitons, doing landscape and architecture projects in and out of the Iran and working on a paper .
I assure you that I have made every effort to complete the necessary process and meet the visa requirements. Considering this delay, I would like to kindly request information regarding the late arrival policy for international students, as well as the maximum number of days after the start of classes that I am permitted to arrive in the United States. Understanding thedepartment’s policies will allow me to plan accordingly and ensure that I can join the classes as soon as possible after obtaining my visa.

Once again, I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused by my delay. I value your understanding and will greatly appreciate any guidance you can provide.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I remain eager to join your classes and contribute to the learning environment. I am hopeful that my visa will be granted soon, and I will keep you updated on my progress.




Warm regards,
Paria

Subject: Request for Information on Late Arrival Policy for International Students

Dear Professor Gao,

I hope this email finds you in good health and high spirits as we embark on a new year. Firstly, I would like to express my warmest wishes for a happy, healthy, and prosperous new year to you and your loved ones.

I am writing to inform you that, despite my best efforts, I have not yet been granted my visa to the United States. Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, the visa process is taking longer than anticipated. However, I would like to explore the option of waiting until the last moment to secure my visa before requesting a deferment for Fall 2024.

Attending your classes is of utmost importance to me. I have dedicated the past few months to improving my knowledge in this field through participation in architectural competitions, conducting landscape and architecture projects both inside and outside Iran, and working on a paper. I want to assure you that I have made every possible effort to complete the necessary processes and meet all visa requirements.

Understanding the department's policies will allow me to plan accordingly and ensure that I can join the classes as soon as possible after obtaining my visa.

Once again, I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused by this delay. I truly appreciate your understanding and would greatly appreciate any guidance you can provide during this time.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I remain eager to join your classes and contribute to the learning environment. I am hopeful that my visa will be granted soon, and I will keep you updated on my progress.

Warm regards,
Paria

improve my cover letter by rewriting it in a professional tone. 
To Whom It May Concern,

I am pleased to see the Forest Services are looking for candidates suitable for the Biological Technician position. Although my resume reflects a major gap between the prior time working with the U.S. National Forest to today, my interest in Forestry, Wildlife and Fisheries never left. Ever since I Joined AmeriCorps and was given my first outdoor volunteer work in Joshua Tree, CA I knew this was the right career for me. After coming from California and to Alaska, doing similar work, that reassured me that working in an outdoor field was my calling. 

I will admit my prior experience working in a library goes way back to junior high and high school, accumulating hours of volunteer time and many more on my free time. But rest assure, my clerical managing skills greatly reflects the duties of this position:

•	Organize and separate invoices from non-payments and late payments before the billing process.
•	Answering calls to assist the customers and clients’ essential needs.
•	Review and record clienteles bulk purchases and requests for future inventory orders.
•	Check supply stock for low or no office materials. Contact vendors for monthly supply orders.
•	Scan and replicate copies of files, deposits, and documents for references and internal backup.

I am positive that my experience will bring a great deal to the table. Thank you for your consideration and taking the time to review my application. 

Sincerely,

Cindy Qiao

Cindy Qiao

Dear [Recipient's Name],

I am excited to have come across the opportunity for the Biological Technician position within Forest Services. Despite the gap in my employment history, which can be seen in my resume, my passion for Forestry, Wildlife, and Fisheries has always remained unwavering. My initial exposure to the outdoor field during my time with AmeriCorps, where I engaged in volunteer work in Joshua Tree, CA, served as a defining moment that solidified my pursuit of a career in this field. Subsequent experiences in similar roles in both California and Alaska further confirmed that working in an outdoor environment is my true calling.

While my prior experience primarily focused on clerical work in a library during junior high and high school, I have accumulated numerous hours of volunteer time in this capacity, both during and outside of school. This background has enhanced my clerical managing skills, which are directly applicable to the duties and responsibilities outlined in the Biological Technician position. Specifically, I possess the ability to:

• Organize and categorize invoices, differentiating between non-payments and late payments in preparation for the billing process.
• Provide excellent customer service by promptly addressing phone inquiries and fulfilling customers' and clients' essential needs.
• Review and accurately record bulk purchases and future inventory requests made by clientele.
• Regularly monitor office supply stock levels and liaise with vendors to ensure seamless monthly supply orders.
• Utilize my proficient scanning and replication skills to create copies of files, deposits, and other documents for both reference and internal backup purposes.

I am confident that my past experiences and skill set make me a valuable asset to your organization. Thank you for considering my application. I appreciate the time you have taken to review my qualifications.

Sincerely,

Cindy Qiao

context.content: please review this cover letter
Of course! I'd be happy to help you review your cover letter. Please copy and paste the text of your cover letter here, and I'll provide you with feedback and suggestions.

Ahmed Hegazy
Planning Engineer
SUMMARY

Highly motivated planning engineer with +5 years of experience in construction projects. Able to anticipate problems, attack and solve them before they become major issues. Always delivering results against targeted objectives, whilst working within the organization core values and beliefs.


Cover Letter

Date: 18 Jun 2023
Dear HR,

It is an honor to provide you with an application for the Senior Project Control Engineer Position. I am sending this E-mail as a part of my plan to achieve my future vision and upgrade my career progression.

I have completed all the required formal and practical education, in addition to that, I started my career as a site engineer for 4 years to learn all the technical and fine details in the construction site then a year and half as Project Coordinator and Planning Engineer in REDCON Construction, during this period I gained a significant amount of knowledge in many aspects which I think is essential to become Project Control Engineer such as:
•Reporting skills.
•Attending conferences, business meetings, and events.
•Prepare effective presentation.
•Budgeting 
•Review Baseline schedule 
•Monitor the project progress and update the time schedule
•Monitor project expenses 

As such, I am confident that I can be a good fit position, I am hard working and dedicated to my vocation. Also focused on improving myself and sharpening the skills that I have developed so far. In addition to that, I am open minded and ready to embrace various ideas so as to improve the condition of the organization.

Enclosed you will find my resume, which further details my skills, experience, and qualifications. I appreciate the chance to make this application and look forward to hearing from you.
Best Regards,

Ahmed Hegazy

Dear HR,

I am writing to apply for the Senior Project Control Engineer position with great enthusiasm. I have carefully prepared this application as part of my strategy to accomplish my long-term goals and advance my career.

Having completed both formal and practical education, I commenced my career as a site engineer, where I acquired a comprehensive understanding of the technical aspects involved in construction projects. Following that, I spent a year and a half as a Project Coordinator and Planning Engineer at REDCON Construction. Throughout this period, I have acquired valuable knowledge in various key areas that I believe are crucial for a Project Control Engineer, including reporting skills, attending conferences and business meetings, preparing effective presentations, budgeting, reviewing baseline schedules, monitoring project progress and expenses.

Given my dedication and hardworking nature, I strongly believe that I am well-suited for this position. I continually strive to improve myself and further hone the skills I have acquired thus far. Additionally, I am open-minded and eager to embrace new ideas in order to enhance the organization's capabilities.

Please find my enclosed resume, which provides further details on my skills, experience, and qualifications. I am extremely grateful for the opportunity to submit this application and I eagerly await hearing from you.

Best Regards,
Ahmed Hegazy

Overall, your cover letter is well-written and effectively highlights your relevant experience and skills. Here are a few suggestions to enhance it:

1. Begin with a strong opening statement that captures the reader's attention and shows your enthusiasm for the position.

2. Consider including specific examples of your accomplishments and successes in your previous roles to provide concrete evidence of your skills and capabilities.

3. To further demonstrate your qualifications, you may want to mention any certifications or additional training you have undertaken.

4. It's always a good idea to tailor your cover letter to the specific company or organization you are applying to. Research the company and incorporate any relevant information or values into your letter.

将所有主角改为第一人称，文章中出现的除了直系亲属以外的人物不超过1个，如果事件中直系亲属以外的人物超过1个就把发生这些事件的人归结到直系亲属以外的那个人物，文章风格应该口语化而且达到母语者的水平贴合日常表达。
(Important decision) It was a big day for Sarah. She had to make an important decision that would shape her future. She had two options – continue with her boring corporate job or take up a new and (interesting job) that would require her to travel to different parts of the world.

She decided to quit her job and took up the new job. The job was to be a travel writer for a famous magazine. She was thrilled to be able to travel to different parts of the world and write about her experiences.

(She had read the book many times before) Before starting her new job, Sarah made it a point to read some of the famous books written by travel writers. She read books like Eat, Pray, Love and Into the Wild. She also started to follow (a habit of enjoying life) which she had learned from these books. She started to meditate, do yoga and take time out to travel and explore new places.

Sarah quickly climbed the ranks in her new job and started to get assignments to cover events like music festivals and adventure sports events. She was living her dream, but she knew that this was not the end goal. She wanted to do more and (learn more things).

One day she got an assignment to cover an expedition to the South Pole. She jumped at the opportunity and started to prepare for the expedition. She trained for months to build up her stamina and learn the necessary survival skills.

Sarah’s trip to the South Pole was a life-changing experience for her. It made her realize that there was so much more to explore and learn in this world. She decided to go back to school and get a degree in environmental studies. She wanted to use her skills to help the planet and make a difference.

In the end, Sarah’s (important decision) to quit her job and follow her dreams paid off. She had an (interesting job) which allowed her to travel the world, she followed (a habit of enjoying life), read books which inspired her and she always kept her eyes open for (things she wanted to learn).

It was a big day for me. I had to make an important decision that would shape my future. I had two options – continue with my boring corporate job or take up a new and interesting job that would require me to travel to different parts of the world.

I decided to quit my job and took up the new job. The job was to be a travel writer for a famous magazine. I was thrilled to be able to travel to different parts of the world and write about my experiences.

Before starting my new job, I made it a point to read some of the famous books written by travel writers. I read books like Eat, Pray, Love and Into the Wild. I also started to follow a habit of enjoying life which I had learned from these books. I started to meditate, do yoga and take time out to travel and explore new places.

I quickly climbed the ranks in my new job and started to get assignments to cover events like music festivals and adventure sports events. I was living my dream, but I knew that this was not the end goal. I wanted to do more and learn more things.

One day I got an assignment to cover an expedition to the South Pole. I jumped at the opportunity and started to prepare for the expedition. I trained for months to build up my stamina and learn the necessary survival skills.

My trip to the South Pole was a life-changing experience for me. It made me realize that there was so much more to explore and learn in this world. I decided to go back to school and get a degree in environmental studies. I wanted to use my skills to help the planet and make a difference.

In the end, my important decision to quit my job and follow my dreams paid off. I had an interesting job which allowed me to travel the world, I followed a habit of enjoying life, read books which inspired me and I always kept my eyes open for things I wanted to learn.

Write the below letter for the post of Marketing specialist. Adapt the relevant content from below letter:

Ramasamy Balakumar
28, 1st Chapal Lane, Colombo 06,
Sri Lanka.

[Manager - HR]
[Company Name]
[Company Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]

Dear Sir/Madam,

Re: Application for the Position of Marketing Manager

I am writing to express my interest in the Marketing Manager position at [Company Name], as advertised on topjobs.lk. Please find attached my resume for your kind perusal.

As an energetic and results-driven marketing professional, I am seeking a challenging career in Marketing Operations. Currently, I am employed as the Marketing Manager at Communico.Ai in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, where I am responsible for overseeing the planning and execution of branding and marketing communication deliverables, including digital marketing and events.

With over fifteen years of experience in Brand Management and Marketing Communication, I have developed expertise in various aspects of these functions. Throughout my career, I have successfully managed overall product management and marketing mix, executed impactful marketing activities and campaigns, and effectively coordinated agencies and suppliers. My industry experience spans across sectors such as Telecommunications, Information Technology, Apparel, Food & Beverage, and others. Additionally, I have gained more than two years of valuable international experience working in Saudi Arabia, further enhancing my skills and knowledge.

My proficiency extends to marketing procurement, printing and production, as well as indoor and outdoor branding. Having worked at Advertising Agencies in the past, I have effectively developed and implemented communication strategies for leading brands, both locally and internationally. This has equipped me with an in-depth understanding of the intricacies of the role and allowed me to consistently deliver exceptional results across administrative and operational functions.

Backed by a Master of Business Administration qualification and a professional marketing qualification from the Chartered Institute of Marketing (CIM UK), I believe I am well-suited for a middle management position at your organization. I have a strong track record of driving success and delivering value, and I am confident that my combination of drive and experience will make me an invaluable asset to your team.

Thank you for considering my application. I have enclosed my resume to provide you with further details about my skills and qualifications. I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss any potential opportunities that align with my profile.

Yours sincerely,

[Your Name]

Ramasamy Balakumar
28, 1st Chapal Lane, Colombo 06,
Sri Lanka.

[Manager - HR]
[Company Name]
[Company Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]

Dear Sir/Madam,

Re: Application for the Position of Marketing Specialist

I am writing to express my interest in the Marketing Specialist position at [Company Name], as advertised on topjobs.lk. Please find attached my resume for your kind perusal.

Having worked as a Marketing Manager at Communico.Ai in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, I am well-versed in overseeing branding and marketing communication deliverables, including digital marketing and events. With over fifteen years of experience in Brand Management and Marketing Communication, I have developed expertise in various aspects of these functions.

Throughout my career, I have successfully managed product management, executed impactful marketing activities and campaigns, and effectively coordinated agencies and suppliers. My industry experience spans across sectors such as Telecommunications, Information Technology, Apparel, and Food & Beverage. I have gained valuable international experience working in Saudi Arabia, enhancing my skills and knowledge.

My proficiency extends to marketing procurement, printing and production, as well as indoor and outdoor branding. Working at Advertising Agencies in the past has provided me with the ability to develop and implement communication strategies for leading brands, both locally and internationally. This has equipped me with an in-depth understanding of the role's intricacies, allowing me to consistently deliver exceptional results across administrative and operational functions.

With a Master of Business Administration qualification and a professional marketing qualification from the Chartered Institute of Marketing (CIM UK), I believe I am a strong candidate for the Marketing Specialist position. My track record of driving success and delivering value, combined with my drive and experience, will make me an invaluable asset to your team.

Thank you for considering my application. I have enclosed my resume to provide you with further details about my skills and qualifications. I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss how my expertise aligns with the needs of [Company Name].

Yours sincerely,

Ramasamy Balakumar

can you please translate this Chinese letter to English and make it concise, precise, polite and native-sounded: 来自女儿的担保信
这封信是用来确认我，qzq，是qql的女儿，邀请了我的父亲作为旅游者来英国。
我是一名牛津大学的大一新生，将于十月开始我的大学生活。我的护照号是EJ6489540，我的学生签证号是022531800.
我很高兴证明，是我邀请我的父亲在十月与我一同抵达。因为有他的帮助我相信自己可以更顺利的入住，熟悉新环境并融入大学。
另外，我的父亲是我大学学费即生活费的资助人，我希望借此机会向他展示我未来的校园生活会是什么样的。
我担保他在英国期间合法住宿、合法消费。我担保他合法出入境，他会利用假期的时间前来，并在假期结束时回国继续工作，这由他的在职证明证明。我担保他有足够资金，他为自己全程的开销负责，这由材料里的存款证书证明。

Letter of Guarantee from Daughter

This letter is to confirm that I, qzq, am the daughter of qql and I have invited my father to visit the UK as a tourist.

I am currently a first-year student at Oxford University and will begin my university life in October. My passport number is EJ6489540, and my student visa number is 022531800.

I am delighted to confirm that I have invited my father to arrive with me in October. Having his support will enable me to settle in smoothly, familiarize myself with the new environment, and integrate into university life.

Furthermore, my father is the sponsor for my university tuition and living expenses. I hope to take this opportunity to demonstrate to him what my future campus life will be like.

I guarantee that he will stay legally and consume within legal limits during his stay in the UK. I guarantee that he will enter and exit the country legally, as he plans to visit during his vacation time and return to continue his work after the vacation, as can be verified by his employment certificate. I guarantee that he has sufficient funds and he will be responsible for all his expenses, as evidenced by the deposit certificate in the documents.

context.content:
Write a supervisor's letter of support to go with this application letter below. The letter of support shouldn't say the same things at this application letter, it should focus more on how the applicant is worthy of receiving the grant because they have done a good job. The tone should be academic

Application letter:

	I am writing to apply for the early career investigator grant program, to present my original research at the 26th annual meeting of the Association for the Scientific Study of Consciousness (ASSC26). For the past year I have been interning with the Centre for Psychedelic Research at Imperial College London, under the supervision of Dr. Chris Timmermann. I have been researching the phenomenology of psychedelic experiences, using innovations in both qualitative and quantitative methods. 
	I have been accepted to present my work in a talk at ASSC26, a conference which is attended by many of the most influential researchers and philosophers in the study of consciousness. It is an ideal forum for disseminating this work to my peers in the study of consciousness, taking these psychedelic insights beyond the psychedelic ‘bubble’ to researchers working on the broader problem of the scientific understanding of consciousness.
	My accepted talk, titled “Towards a micro-phenomenology of the intravenous DMT experience” describes the first-ever application of the micro-phenomenological analysis method to psychedelic interview data. 

The preliminary version of these results was presented by me in a poster at the Interdisciplinary Conference on Psychedelic Research (ICPR) in September 2022. In forthcoming research, these results will be utilised in a neurophenomenological analysis of the first ever combined fMRI/EEG imaging study of the brain under DMT. We believe this degree of novelty in both qualitative and quantitative methods speaks to the importance and potential impact of this research project, in a field where the discourse on how the subjective effects of psychedelics contribute to their transformative outcomes is at the forefront. 
	I am grateful to have the support of Dr. Timmerman to move on to study a PhD under his supervision at Imperial College London. As I have not yet begun this PhD program (expected commencement: fall 2023), and my current role is that of an intern or ‘visiting researcher’, it is outside the standard practices for the Centre for Psychedelic Research to fund my attendance at ASSC26. I have worked on the side to support myself through my Bachelors study (completed March 2022) and my current full-time internship, but this income is barely enough to live on. Thus I face a financial barrier to attending ASSC26. I seek support from the Heffter Research Institute to make my participation at this prestigious conference possible. 
	I have so much passion for this research, I dedicate my life and livelihood to it. Should I receive this support I can say confidently that I will utilize the opportunity to its fullest, representing both Imperial College London and the Heffter Research Institute to the highest standard, while sharing my research and making rich new connections across the international field.

Subject: Letter of Support for [Your Name]'s Application for the Heffter Research Institute Researcher Travel Grant

Dear Heffter Research Institute Grant Committee,

I am writing to express my wholehearted support for [Your Name]'s application to the Heffter Research Institute's early career investigator grant program. As [Your Name]'s supervisor at the Centre for Psychedelic Research at Imperial College London over the past year, I have had the opportunity to closely observe their strong commitment, dedication, and outstanding skills as they made unparalleled progress in their research on the phenomenology of psychedelic experiences.

[Your Name] has shown a remarkable ability to innovate and adapt, utilizing both qualitative and quantitative methods in their research to uncover new insights into the intricacies of psychedelic experiences. Their accepted talk, titled "Towards a micro-phenomenology of the intravenous DMT experience," is a prime example of their capacity to break new ground in the field of consciousness research, with preliminary results already being recognized and presented at the Interdisciplinary Conference on Psychedelic Research (ICPR) in 2022.

I would like to emphasize the potential impact of [Your Name]'s research in advancing our understanding of the role of subjective effects in the transformative potential of psychedelics. Their persistence and enthusiasm for the rigorous investigation of these complex phenomena have given me full confidence in the valuable contributions [Your Name] will continue to make in their forthcoming PhD studies under my supervision at Imperial College London.

As an intern at the Centre for Psychedelic Research, [Your Name] faces financial challenges that prevent them from attending the prestigious ASSC26 conference without external support. I firmly believe they have earned and are very deserving of the assistance provided by the Heffter Research Institute's Researcher Travel Grant. This support will not only enable them to present their groundbreaking research at an international stage but also foster collaborations and connections with experts working on the broader problem of the scientific understanding of consciousness.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend [Your Name] to be a recipient of the early career investigator grant program. Their research achievements, commitment to excellence, and dedication to the field of consciousness research makes them an exceptionally worthy candidate. They are well prepared to represent both Imperial College London and the Heffter Research Institute impeccably at the ASSC26 conference, expanding the impact of their innovative work to the wider scientific community.

Thank you for your thoughtful consideration of [Your Name]'s application.

Sincerely,

Dr. Chris Timmermann
Supervisor, Centre for Psychedelic Research
Imperial College London

以下文本里有我的更多详细信息，请根据这些信息，完善以上你撰写的推荐信，不超过400词：I am writing this letter to highly recommend A Yang for admission to your Master's program. I am Yang Zhou, an Associate Professor, and I have had the pleasure of teaching A in the courses "Geographic Information System Software Application" and "Land Information System" during his undergraduate study in Sichuan Agricultural University.
In both courses, A demonstrated exceptional dedication and achieved outstanding grades of 87 (A) and 91 (A+). She consistently exhibited a strong work ethic, actively participated in class discussions, and completed assignments with remarkable proficiency. Her performance in laboratory tasks was particularly noteworthy, showcasing a high efficiency in completing assignments and a strong aptitude for hands-on work.
Under my guidance, A delved into the fundamentals of Geographic Information System (GIS) in the course "Geographic Information System Software Application." She gained a solid understanding of GIS principles, methods, and the fundamental application of ArcGIS software. A not only mastered the use of GIS technology but also developed the ability to approach relevant research with a 3S (GIS, Remote Sensing, and Global Positioning System) perspective, showcasing her proficiency in solving discipline-related issues. Besides, in the course "Land Information System," A acquired a comprehensive understanding of the basic theories and methods of Land Information System (LIS). She proficiently handled widely-used GIS software such as ArcGIS and learned to manage land resources using information technology. Her grasp of fundamental knowledge, including data input, queries, spatial data representation, spatial analysis, and land information output, was commendable. Additionally, she explored innovative land data acquisition methods, such as utilizing drones and their applications, showcasing adaptability and enthusiasm for emerging technologies.
I had the pleasure of mentoring A in various projects, including the "The 6th "Golden Land Cup" Beautiful Countryside Land Spatial Planning Competition" Research on Greenhouse Gas Prediction in the Context of the "Dual Carbon" Vision—Based on GOSAT Carbon Satellite and Deep Learning Technologies." Furthermore, she actively participated in the 2023 ESRI Cup Chinese University Student GIS Software Development Competition, carried out research with the topic "Spatial-Temporal Evolution of Land Carbon Emissions and Low-Carbon Optimization Study". Her involvement in these projects demonstrated her keen research interest and dedication to exploring innovative approaches.
A has proven herself to be a diligent and enthusiastic researcher, evident in her involvement in urban carbon neutrality studies. She possesses the skills to analyze urban environmental data, evaluate the relationship between urban planning and sustainable development, and employ advanced techniques such as deep learning models (SimVPv1 and SimVPv2) and spatial analysis using Moran's Index for carbon dioxide concentration distribution characteristics.
In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend A Yang for admission to your Master's program. Her earnest attitude towards learning, solid research foundation, and passion for sustainable urban development make her an exceptional candidate. Please feel free to contact me if you require any further information.

Dear Admissions Committee,

I am writing this letter to highly recommend A Yang for admission to your Master's program. I am Yang Zhou, an Associate Professor at Sichuan Agricultural University, and I have had the pleasure of teaching A in the courses "Geographic Information System Software Application" and "Land Information System" during her undergraduate studies.

Throughout the courses, A consistently displayed exceptional dedication and achieved outstanding grades of 87 (A) and 91 (A+). She demonstrated a strong work ethic, actively engaged in class discussions, and consistently showcased her remarkable proficiency in completing assignments. Notably, her performance in laboratory tasks was outstanding, demonstrating her efficiency in completing assignments with a high level of accuracy and a strong aptitude for practical work.

Under my guidance, A delved into the fundamentals of Geographic Information Systems (GIS) in the course "Geographic Information System Software Application." She developed a solid understanding of GIS principles, methods, and the practical application of ArcGIS software. A not only mastered the use of GIS technology but also showcased her ability to approach research with a 3S (GIS, Remote Sensing, and Global Positioning System) perspective, showcasing her proficiency in solving discipline-related issues. Moreover, in the course "Land Information System," A gained a comprehensive understanding of the fundamental theories and methods of Land Information Systems (LIS). She skillfully handled widely-used GIS software like ArcGIS and demonstrated proficiency in managing land resources using information technology. Her grasp of fundamental knowledge, including data input, queries, spatial data representation, spatial analysis, and land information output, was commendable. Additionally, she displayed enthusiasm for emerging technologies, exploring innovative land data acquisition methods, such as utilizing drones, which highlighted her adaptability and eagerness to stay up-to-date with industry advancements.

I had the pleasure of mentoring A in various projects, including the "The 6th "Golden Land Cup" Beautiful Countryside Land Spatial Planning Competition" and the research on "Greenhouse Gas Prediction in the Context of the Dual Carbon Vision—Based on GOSAT Carbon Satellite and Deep Learning Technologies." Additionally, she actively participated in the 2023 ESRI Cup Chinese University Student GIS Software Development Competition, conducting research on the "Spatial-Temporal Evolution of Land Carbon Emissions and Low-Carbon Optimization Study." Her involvement in these projects demonstrated her keen interest in research and her dedication to exploring innovative approaches.

A has proven herself as a diligent and enthusiastic researcher, particularly evident in her involvement in urban carbon neutrality studies. She possesses the necessary skills to analyze urban environmental data, evaluate the relationship between urban planning and sustainable development, and employ advanced techniques such as deep learning models (SimVPv1 and SimVPv2) and spatial analysis using Moran's Index to understand carbon dioxide concentration distribution characteristics.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend A Yang for admission to your Master's program. Her earnest attitude towards learning, solid research foundation, and passion for sustainable urban development make her an exceptional candidate. Should you require any further information, please feel free to contact me.

Sincerely,

Yang Zhou
Associate Professor
Sichuan Agricultural University

Ani Pansari

请翻译一下内容：
To whom it may concern,

I am writing to highly recommend Weijia Huang for admission to a master’s program in the fields of finance, economics, and statistics. As a professor in the College of Science at North Polytechnic University, I have had the privilege of being Weijia’s class advisor and teaching her courses on “Machine Learning on Big Data” and “Time Series Analysis” during her undergraduate studies.

Based on my interactions and observations of Weijia, I have no doubt that she possesses the qualities required to excel in a master’s program. She is a highly capable and motivated individual who consistently demonstrates a strong work ethic, a thirst for knowledge, and a genuine passion for her studies.

Weijia’s academic achievements serve as a testament to her dedication and ability to succeed. Throughout her undergraduate studies, she has consistently maintained an outstanding GPA, earning her the title of top student in the class of 150 students in the course of Big Data Machine Learning. In addition, she has achieved remarkable scores on both the GRE and IELTS exams, further highlighting her strong academic abilities.

In the classroom, Weijia is an active and engaged participant. She possesses a deep understanding of the material and readily shares her insights and thoughts with her classmates. Her ability to grasp complex concepts quickly and her willingness to explore beyond the curriculum sets her apart from her peers. Notably, Weijia is enthusiastic about learning and constantly seeks additional resources and materials to enhance her knowledge. She frequently seeks guidance and recommendations, diligently incorporating the information provided into her studies.

Weijia’s commitment to her studies extends beyond the classroom. She actively seeks opportunities to delve deeper into her coursework and engage in research. I have had the pleasure of supervising her research project on the analysis of the TikTok Live Broadcast Experience and Its Influencing Factors. Through her use of rough set theory, simplified algorithms, and data analysis techniques, Weijia has demonstrated her ability to apply her knowledge in practical settings. Her research findings were published in the reputable journal, Statistics and Application, which reflects her high level of innovation and analytical thinking.

Moreover, Weijia’s internships at Dagong Global Credit Rating Co., Ltd. and Beijing Shou’an Human Resources Consulting Service Co., Ltd. have provided her with valuable experience in data analysis, marketing, and business development. She has showcased her proficiency in utilizing various computer software programs, such as SAS, SPSS, and R Language, in a professional context, further enhancing her skill set.

Beyond her academic pursuits, Weijia actively participates in various extracurricular activities. She has served as a host and team leader for lectures on Chinese tradition and popular phrases for international students, showcasing her leadership and organizational skills. Additionally, her involvement in the Computer Association and the Table Tennis Club demonstrates her ability to balance academic excellence with a diverse range of interests.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly believe that Weijia Huang would be an exceptional candidate for a master’s program in finance, economics, and statistics. Her exceptional academic performance, strong work ethic, analytical thinking skills, and passion for learning make her an ideal candidate for advanced studies in these fields. I highly recommend Weijia Huang for admission to the master’s program, as I am confident that she will excel and contribute significantly to the program.

Please feel free to contact me if you require any further information.

敬启者，

我写信推荐黄伟嘉入读金融、经济学及统计学领域的硕士项目。作为北方理工大学科学学院的教授，我曾有幸担任黄伟嘉的班级指导老师，并在她本科期间教授了《大数据机器学习》和《时间序列分析》等课程。

基于我与黄伟嘉的互动和观察，我毫不怀疑她具备在硕士项目中取得优异表现所需的素质。她是一个极具能力和动力的个人，始终展现出强烈的职业道德、对知识的渴望以及对学习的真挚热情。

黄伟嘉的学业成就证明了她的执着和成功能力。在本科期间，她一直保持着出色的GPA，名列《大数据机器学习》这门课程150名学生中的第一。此外，她在GRE和IELTS考试中取得了优异成绩，进一步凸显了她出色的学术能力。

在课堂上，黄伟嘉是一个积极参与的学生。她对课程内容有着深入的理解，并乐于与同学们分享自己的见解和思考。她快速掌握复杂概念的能力以及愿意在课程之外探索的意愿使她与同龄人有所区别。值得注意的是，黄伟嘉对学习充满热情，不断寻求额外的资源和材料来增加自己的知识储备。她经常寻求指导和建议，并将所得信息认真融入学习中。

黄伟嘉对学习的承诺不仅限于课堂。她积极寻求深入研究课程内容并参与研究项目。我有幸指导她关于抖音直播体验及其影响因素分析的研究项目。通过她对粗糙集理论、简化算法和数据分析技术的运用，黄伟嘉展示了她将知识应用于实际情境的能力。她的研究成果在高水平期刊《统计与应用》上发表，展示了她创新和分析思维的高水平。

除了学业追求，黄伟嘉还积极参与各种课外活动。她曾担任国际学生会关于中国传统和常用词语的讲座主持人和团队负责人，展示了她的领导和组织能力。此外，她还参加了计算机协会和乒乓球俱乐部，充分展示了她在追求学术卓越的同时保持多元兴趣的能力。

context.content:
Please refine and polish the following statement so as the convince the visa officer that our visit to Canada is on a temporary basis  and we will return China on time:

PURPOSE of VISIT
To whom it may concern:

This is Yueyuan Li (Passport No.: EG7495171, Applicant-1), I am writing for my daughter Ni TIAN (Passport No.: EK7648123, Applicant-2) and my temporary visit visa applications. My wife, Yueyuan LI’s student visa got approved on Sep. 7, 2023 and will begin her 2.5-year fulltime study on MA in Leadership, Health Care at Trinity Western University in Canada in January 2024. Considering our daughter is just 2.5 years old, still too young to leave her mother for too long, it is important to us that my daughter and I have the opportunity to visit my wife Yueyuan in Canada from time to time. Therefore, I kindly request that my daughter and I are granted the opportunity to visit Yueyuan in Canada on a temporary basis from time to time.

As my wife Yueyuan will leave for Canada soon, I plan to bring our daughter to visit her in Canada from February 6, 2024, to February 16, 2024, during my 10-day paid annual leave, which coincides with the Spring Festival Holidays. My wife will make arrangements for our accommodation near her university as soon as she arrives in Canada. The proposed itinerary for our visit is as follows:

- February 6th -7th: Arrival and rest to recover from jet lag.
- February 8th: Shopping to prepare for the New Year’s Eve.
- February 9th -11th: Celebrate the New Year’s Eve and Chinese Spring Festival.
- February 12th-13th: Spend quality time with my wife and explore the city of Vancouver.
- February 14th: Enjoy Valentine’s Day.
- February 15th-16th: Last-minute shopping for relatives and friends in China before returning.

We believe that these arrangements will ensure a memorable family reunion in Canada and provide our daughter, Ni Tian, with an opportunity to have her first relaxed international trip, while still allowing her sufficient time in China to adjust and prepare for her kindergarten enrollment. Additionally, I will have the opportunity to visit our parents and convey our belated Spring Festival greetings and gifts.

Dear officer, there is no need to worry about our family’s financial capacity. Previous work experiences have brought me a considerable amount of funds accumulation. I have provided with you RMB 300,000 (equivalent to CAD55,350) of Time deposit as guarantee funds. Besides, there are RMB 570,000 (equivalent to CAD105,165) of fixed deposit, one house and garage as well as wo private cars under my wife’s name, which could be used as our supplementary fund.

As the Regional General Manager of Banyan (Chengdu) Techn., Co., Ltd., I must return on time to resume my work. Besides working hard and taking good care of our daughter, old parents and assets wholeheartedly during Yueyuan’s study in Canada, I will assist my mother-in-law WANG Ping in managing the development of our family business Sichuan British Choice International Trade Limited diligently. Our couple have RMB 2,400,000yuan investment under my wife’s name in the company. I will keep on working hard to make money to support our good living in Chengdu, China while my wife is studying hard for her 2.5-year MA program in Canada. 

We really hope our applications could be approved so that we family could reunite in Canada with permission on a temporary basis from time to time. We promise you that we will obey the local laws and immigration regulations. If you need any information or else, please feel free to contact me.

Best Regards,
Yueyuan Li (Applicant-1)
Ni TIAN (Applicant-2)
September 26, 2023

PURPOSE OF VISIT

To whom it may concern:

I am writing on behalf of myself, Ruiqi TIAN (Passport No.: EG7495171, Applicant-1), and my daughter, Ni TIAN (Passport No.: EK7648123, Applicant-2), to apply for temporary visit visas to Canada. My wife, Yueyuan LI, has been approved for a student visa to pursue an MA in Leadership, Health Care at Trinity Western University, with studies commencing in January 2024. As our daughter is only 2.5 years old, it is crucial for us that she and I have the opportunity to visit my wife in Canada from time to time. Therefore, we kindly request that our visit to Canada is considered temporary.

My wife will be leaving for Canada soon, and I plan to bring our daughter to visit her from February 6, 2024, to February 16, 2024. This visit coincides with my 10-day paid annual leave, which aligns with the Spring Festival Holidays. As soon as my wife arrives in Canada, she will make arrangements for our accommodation near her university. Our proposed itinerary for the visit is as follows:

- February 6th-7th: Arrival and rest to recover from jet lag.
- February 8th: Shopping to prepare for the New Year’s Eve.
- February 9th-11th: Celebrate the New Year’s Eve and Chinese Spring Festival.
- February 12th-13th: Spend quality time with my wife and explore the city of Vancouver.
- February 14th: Enjoy Valentine’s Day.
- February 15th-16th: Last-minute shopping for relatives and friends in China before returning.

We firmly believe that these arrangements will ensure a memorable family reunion in Canada while allowing our daughter, Ni Tian, to have her first relaxed international trip. Additionally, she will have ample time in China to adjust and prepare for her kindergarten enrollment. During the visit, I also plan to visit our parents and convey belated Spring Festival greetings and gifts.

We want to assure you that our family's financial capacity is stable. My previous work experiences have allowed me to accumulate a considerable amount of funds. I have provided a guarantee fund of RMB 300,000 (equivalent to CAD 55,350) through a time deposit. Additionally, my wife's name is associated with RMB 570,000 (equivalent to CAD 105,165) of fixed deposit, a house, a garage, and two private cars, which serve as our supplementary funds.

As the Regional General Manager of Banyan (Chengdu) Techn., Co., Ltd., I have professional responsibilities that require my prompt return to work. While my wife diligently focuses on her studies, I will handle my work responsibilities and take care of our daughter, elderly parents, and assets. I will also assist my mother-in-law, WANG Ping, in managing the development of our family business, Sichuan British Choice International Trade Limited. Our company has an investment of RMB 2,400,000 under my wife's name, and we are committed to working hard to ensure a stable and prosperous life in Chengdu, China while my wife completes her 2.5-year MA program in Canada.

We sincerely hope that our visa applications are approved to allow our family to reunite in Canada on a temporary basis. We assure you that we will comply with all local laws and immigration regulations. If there is any additional information or documentation required, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best Regards,
Yueyuan Li (Applicant-1)
Ni TIAN (Applicant-2)
September 26, 2023

context.content:
This is job description from wellfound.

About the job
About us

In the last few years, remote and hybrid work has had an explosion in popularity, giving workers an unprecedented level of access to opportunity and an increase in quality of life. However, our existing tools were not set up to do remote work well. Work can be isolating, transactional, and void of the camaraderie that makes everyone feel like they’re in it together.

To solve this, Gather builds virtual offices that bring the best of in-person work to remote. We’ve already seen success with our approach, with over 10,000 remote-first companies using our spaces every day.

And yet it’s still the early days for our broader vision of the Metaverse. We’re excited about how the Metaverse can break down physical constraints that exist today, not just in where you can work, but which friends/family you can see, or what educational opportunities you can have access to.

Join us in this mission!

Role overview:

Product Engineers at Gather design and implement the features that make up what is simultaneously a live video chat platform, multiplayer game, and modern web app. The thoughtful design and rapid experimentation embody the core of what’s enabled Gather to scale to where it is today and to scale to the next million Gather users. You’ll be responsible for using your customer understanding to work closely with designers, product managers, and others within the company in order to quickly design, deliver, and iterate on features. You care about connecting users and making remote work a great experience within Gather.

Where you will make an impact:

Collaborate with designers, product managers, and engineers to design, implement, and iterate on features and product directions
Ability to quickly iterate on experiments while preventing technical lock-in
Enable more powerful tools and remote work features to be used within Gather
Level up our meeting experiences and create opportunities for moments of serendipity for Gather users
Write maintainable, clear, well-architected code, tests, and documentation
Participate in code reviews and design reviews to ensure quality and good architecture
*What you bring: *

Ability to ruthlessly prioritize in a chaotic and ambiguous environment
A healthy tolerance for the balance between Doing Things Right and iterating and shipping quickly
Experience working with Typescript and NodeJS
A keen intuition for well-designed software and well-written code
Intrinsic motivation and the drive to solve difficult problems without guidance
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
6+ years of experience working with Typescript, React, and Redux
You are scrappy, have a bias toward action, and love moving fast
You enjoy spending time with customers and are adept and getting to the root problems that your product is uniquely positioned to solve
Intrinsic motivation and the drive to solve difficult problems without guidance
US Salary Range

At Gather, compensation may vary outside of this range depending on a number of factors, including a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies and experience, and location. The base salary range for this position in the selected city is $184,500 - $205,000 annually and we encourage candidates outside of this salary range to apply.

Base pay is one part of the total package that is provided to compensate and recognize employees for their work, and this role may be eligible for a stock reward program.

Benefits

Work remotely out of a state-of-the-art virtual office!
Competitive compensation, benefits, and meaningful equity
Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance for employees and their dependents
401k and matching program
Generous PTO policy and mental health days to recharge
Meal stipend twice a week to keep you nourished
